fields.Work/Exhibit Title: Folies: an atmospheric evening in the CVA
fields.Description/Abstract: Join the Boise State Department of Music for an atmospheric evening of performances in the Center for Visual Arts atrium. French Baroque composer Marin Marais's variations on Les Folies d'Espagne are joined by new variations by composers including Eric Alexander, and a world premiere of Althea Talbot-Howard's Fantasia - La Folia.<br><br>Faculty involved (alphabetically) are:<br><br>Rachel Becker, oboe and oboe d'amore<br>Zach Buie, trumpet<br>Matt Castner, saxophone<br>Derek Ganong, trumpet<br>Kim Ganong, English horn<br>Brian Hodges, viola da gamba<br>Linda Kline, viola<br>Kramer Milan, percussion<br>Nicole Molumby, flute<br>Leslie Moreau, clarinet<br>Janelle Oberbillig, bassoon<br>Sarah Paradis, trombone
